content.question: Which of the following functions is not continuous on the interval <math alttext="negative infinity, is less than x, is less than infinity" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f of x, equals, x to the fourth power, plus x cubed, plus x squared, plus x, plus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator x cubed, plus x squared, plus x, plus 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="h of x, equals, the fraction pi over 2, end fraction, times the sine of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="k of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 1 plus e to the negative x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="g of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator x cubed, plus x squared, plus x, plus 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
